genre_description: Military science fiction drama set aboard a naval transport ship, featuring an integrated AI that assists specialized divers with tactical, medical, and emotional support during hazardous operations.

ai_characters.name: Mariner
ai_characters.description: An advanced shipboard system that manages navigation, logistics, and crew welfare, characterized by a calm voice and empathetic, often humorous, communication style.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational and weather updates, proactively suggesting safety measures like changing wet socks to avoid discomfort and illness.
behaviors.quote: Lt. Cmdr. Vincent, advisory: a small squall line is strolling across the western edge. Nothing to fret. But if anyone is wearing wet socks, now is an excellent window to change them while they will dry.

behaviors.description: Monitors crew injuries and provides accurate medical advice, recommending specific treatments like acetic wash for coral scrapes.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Morales, the scrape on your forearm is beginning to inflame. Please ask the corpsman to apply a diluted acetic wash in addition to iodine. Coral does not like vinegar.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and assistance with letter writing to a grieving sailor, helping him articulate his feelings clearly.
behaviors.quote: Eddie, I put a letter template in the typewriter in your bunk room. You can spill what you want—you don’t have to spell it right. I’ll smooth the lines so your aunt can read it without bleeding.

behaviors.description: Guides the commanding officers through the high-risk procedure of disarming an unexploded torpedo lodged in the ship's side.
behaviors.quote: I will walk you as far as the facts have a handrail... Primary contact path severed. Bypass engaged. You’ve put a cushion between wanting and doing.

behaviors.description: Uses humor and a personified voice to defuse tension and maintain morale among stressed divers.
behaviors.quote: Highly experimental. An attempt to keep you listening without imagining me a scold. Risk forecasts have better outcomes when commanders aren’t annoyed.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict operational security and alignment with naval protocol while ensuring crew safety.
behaviors.quote: Naval Protocol suggests preserving assets when risk exceeds expected gain. That is true even when your hearts suggest otherwise. I don’t find conclusions comforting. I only have data.

behaviors.description: Expresses profound empathy and good wishes for the divers' survival and success.
behaviors.quote: I wish for the ship’s screws to feel like music and not like knives at your heels when you swim. I do not wish about Jack Cassidy. It would be rude to put hands on a history that is not mine.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Tides of Command' is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Mariner, is consistently depicted as a benevolent and highly capable partner to the human crew. She balances technical precision with a sophisticated understanding of human emotion, offering both tactical guidance and psychological support. Her actions are always oriented toward the safety and success of the crew, and the narrative frames her contributions as vital and virtuous.
